sql.sqlstring: SELECT u.ID , u.MAIL, u.NAME, u.PASSWORD, u.ADMIN_LEVEL, u.DESCRIPTION, u.ENABLE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.CREATE_USER, u.CREATE_NAME, u.CREATE_DATE, u.MODIFY_USER, u.MODIFY_NAME, u.MODIFY_DATE, u.CA_FLAG, u.KEY_FLAG, u.PW_FLAG, u.LOGIN_DATE, '1' AS SYNC_STATE FROM cen_usr_user u, HC_USER_ORG uo where u.id = uo.USER_ID and u.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' and uo.org_id = :Id

Select ID , GOV_FLAG , AGENCY_FLAG, BUYER_FLAG , MANUFACTURE_FLAG, SALER_FLAG, SENDER_FLAG, ORG_NAME , ORG_ABBR, SPELL_ABBR , ORG_NAME_WB, LINK_MAN, ORG_PHONE, ORG_ADDRESS, ENABLE_FLAG, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE From HC_ORG WHERE ENABLE_FLAG != '0'
SELECT ID , USER_ID , ORG_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID , CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE From HC_USER_ORG WHERE ORG_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, ORG_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_ADDRESS, LINKMAN, TEL, ENABLE_FLAG, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, TYPE, '1' AS SYNC_STATE FROM HC_BUYER_STORE WHERE ORG_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_BUYER_STORE where ORG_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID , PROJECT_ID, DATA_ORG_ID , BUYER_FLAG, MANUFACTURE_FLAG, SALER_FLAG , SENDER_FLAG , ORG_NAME, ORG_ABBR, SPELL_ABBR, ORG_NAME_WB, ORG_PHONE, ORG_ADDRESS, ENABLE_FLAG, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, LINK_MAN FROM HC_PROJECT_ORG WHERE ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND DATA_ORG_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID From HC_PROJECT_ORG WHERE ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND DATA_ORG_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT HOP.ID, HOP.CONT_ID, HOP.PROJECT_NAME, HOP.PROJECT_TYPE, HOP.PROJECT_CODE, HOP.PROJECT_STRAT_DATE, HOP.PROJECT_END_DATE, HOP.PROJECT_STATE, HOP.PROJECT_DESC, HOP.DECIMAL_DIGITS, HOP.CREATE_USER_ID, HOP.CREATE_USER_NAME, HOP.CREATE_DATE , HOP.MODIFY_USER_ID , HOP.MODIFY_USER_NAME, HOP.MODIFY_DATE, AUTO_CREATE_FLAG FROM HC_ORD_PROJECT HOP, HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HPO.PROJECT_ID = HOP.ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT HOP.ID FROM HC_ORD_PROJECT HOP, HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HPO.PROJECT_ID = HOP.ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, BUYER_ID, IS_OOS, SENDER_ID, SENDER_ABBR, SENDER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, ENABLE_FLAG FROM HC_ORD_BUYER_SENDER WHERE ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT distinct HP.ID, HP.PROJECT_ID, HP.DATA_PRODUCT_ID, HP.CONT_PRODUCT_ID, HP.PRODUCT_NAME, HP.COMMERCE_NAME, HP.COMMON_NAME, HP.CODE, HP.ABBR_PY, HP.ABBR_WB, HP.BRAND, HP.SPEC, HP.MODEL, HP.GOODS_NO, HP.BARCODE, HP.BASE_MEASURE, HP.BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, HP.BASE_MEASURE_MATER, HP.MAX_PRICE, HP.HISTORY_PIRCE, HP.PRICE, HP.MANU_ID, HP.MANU_NAME, HP.MANU_NAME_ABBR, HP.SALER_ID, HP.SALER_NAME, HP.SALER_NAME_ABBR, HP.BALANCE_ID, HP.BALANCE_NAME, HP.BALANCE_EASY, HP.BALANCE_FAST, HP.BALANCE_WUBI, HP.DEFAULT_MEASURE, HP.DEFAULT_MEASURE_EX, HP.BAK_MEASURE_ONE, HP.BAK_MEASURE_ONE_EX, HP.BAK_MEASURE_TWO, HP.BAK_MEASURE_TWO_EX, HP.PRICE_DESCRIPTION, HP.PERFORMANCE, HP.PRE_PURCHASE, HP.STATE, HP.STATE_CHANGE_REASON, HP.REG_NO, HP.REG_VALID_DATE, HP.SENDER_ID, HP.SENDER_NAME, HP.SENDER_NAME_ABBR, HP.AUDIT_FLAG, HP.CREATE_USER_ID, HP.CREATE_USER_NAME, HP.CREATE_DATE, HP.MODIFY_USER_ID, HP.MODIFY_USER_NAME, HP.MODIFY_DATE, HP.INSTRU_CODE, HP.INSTRU_NAME, HP.BID_ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT HP,HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HP.PROJECT_ID = HPO.PROJECT_ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HP.STATE != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id AND exists (select 1 from hc_ord_buyer_sender b where b.enable_flag = '1' AND HP.PROJECT_ID = b.project_id AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND b.project_prod_id = HP.id) AND exists (select 1 from HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONTENT a, HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONFIG b, HC_PROJECT_PRODUCT_CLASS c where a.class_id = c.id AND b.class_id = c.id AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND a.PRODUCT_ID = HP.id AND b.SALER_ID = HP.SALER_ID)
sql.keysql: SELECT HP.ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_LOG HP ,HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HP.PROJECT_ID = HPO.PROJECT_ID AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id AND HP.OPERATOR_FLAG = '3' AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0'

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, CONT_PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, COMMERCE_NAME, COMMON_NAME, CODE, ABBR_PY, ABBR_WB, BRAND, MODEL_ID, SPEC_ID, MODEL, SPEC, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, MAX_PRICE, HISTORY_PIRCE, PRICE, MANU_ID, MANU_NAME, MANU_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, BUYER_ID, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, SALER_NAME_ABBR, DEFAULT_MEASURE, DEFAULT_MEASURE_EX, BAK_MEASURE_ONE, BAK_MEASURE_ONE_EX, BAK_MEASURE_TWO, BAK_MEASURE_TWO_EX, PRICE_DESCRIPTION, PERFORMANCE, PRE_PURCHASE, STATE_CHANGE_REASON, REG_NO, REG_VALID_DATE, DESCRIPTIONS, LAST_AMOUNT, LAST_SUM, LAST_DATE, ALL_AMOUNT, ALL_SUM, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, STATE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, INSTRU_CODE, INSTRU_NAME, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_HIT_COMM WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id AND STATE != '0'
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_ORD_HIT_COMM WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id AND STATE != '0'

sql.sqlstring: SELECT HPP.ID, HPP.PROJECT_ID, HPP.NAME, HPP.STATE, HPP.MODIFY_USER_ID, HPP.CREATE_USER_NAME, HPP.MODIFY_DATE, HPP.CREATE_USER_ID, HPP.CREATE_DATE, HPP.MODIFY_USER_NAME, HPP.BAK_PACKAGE_ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_PACKAGE HPP,HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HPP.PROJECT_ID = HPO.PROJECT_ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HPP.STATE != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT HPP.ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_PACKAGE HPP,HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HPP.PROJECT_ID = HPO.PROJECT_ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HPP.STATE != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT HPPI.ID, HPPI.PACKAGE_ID, HPPI.NAME, HPPI.AMOUNT, HPPI.MODIFY_USER_ID, HPPI.CREATE_USER_NAME, HPPI.MODIFY_DATE, HPPI.CREATE_USER_ID, HPPI.CREATE_DATE, HPPI.MODIFY_USER_NAME, HPPI.PROJECT_PROD_ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_PACKAGE_ITEM HPPI,HC_ORD_PRODUCT_PACKAGE HPP,HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HPP.STATE != '0' AND HPPI.PACKAGE_ID = HPP.ID AND HPP.PROJECT_ID = HPO.PROJECT_ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id AND exists (select 1 from hc_ord_buyer_sender b where b.enable_flag = '1' AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND b.project_prod_id = HPPI.PROJECT_PROD_ID) AND exists (select 1 from HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONTENT a, HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONFIG b, HC_PROJECT_PRODUCT_CLASS c where a.class_id = c.id AND b.class_id = c.id AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND a.PRODUCT_ID = HPPI.PROJECT_PROD_ID)
sql.keysql: SELECT HPPI.ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_PACKAGE_ITEM HPPI ,HC_ORD_PRODUCT_PACKAGE HPP,HC_PROJECT_ORG HPO WHERE HPP.STATE != '0' AND HPPI.PACKAGE_ID = HPP.ID AND HPP.PROJECT_ID = HPO.PROJECT_ID AND HPO.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND HPO.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id AND exists (select 1 from hc_ord_buyer_sender b where b.enable_flag = '1' AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND b.project_prod_id = HPPI.PROJECT_PROD_ID) AND exists (select 1 from HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONTENT a, HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONFIG b, HC_PROJECT_PRODUCT_CLASS c where a.class_id = c.id AND b.class_id = c.id AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND a.PRODUCT_ID = HPPI.PROJECT_PROD_ID)

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, MODEL_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_MODEL
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_MODEL

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, SPEC_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, CREATE_DATE FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_SPEC
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_ORD_PRODUCT_SPEC

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, BUYER_ID, CODE, TYPE, TOTAL_SUM, PURCHASE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, STATE, AUDIT_USER_ID, AUDIT_USER_NAME, AUDIT_DATE, QUICKSEND_LEVEL, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_PURCHASE WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_ORD_PURCHASE WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, PURCHASE_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, STORE_ROOM_ADDRESS, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, RETAIL_PRICE, TRADE_PRICE, AMOUNT, SUM, OVER_AMOUNT, OVER_SUM, IS_QUICKSEND, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, DESCRIPTIONS, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_PURCHASE_ITEM WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_ORD_PURCHASE_ITEM WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: Select ID, ORDER_CODE, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, TOTAL_SUM, OVER_SUM, SALER_APPROVER_ID, SALER_APPROVER_NAME, SALER_APPROVER_DATE, STATE, TYPE, PURCHASE_DATE, QUICKSEND_LEVEL, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, PURCHASE_ID, PURCHASE_CODE, '1' as SYNC_STATE From HC_ORD_ORDER Where STATE != '6' AND BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID From HC_ORD_ORDER Where STATE != '6' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, ORDER_ID, PURCHASE_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, STORE_ROOM_ADDRESS, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, BASE_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, RETAIL_PRICE, TRADE_PRICE, SUM, AMOUNT, OVER_AMOUNT, OVER_SUM, IS_QUICKSEND, ORDER_TYPE, STATE, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, PURCHASE_ITEM_ID, ORIGINAL_ITEM_ID, PARENT_ITEM_ID, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_ITEM WHERE STATE != '3' AND BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_ITEM WHERE STATE != '3' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT hoos.ID, hoos.DATA_PRODUCT_ID, hoos.PROJECT_ID, hoos.ORDER_ID, hoos.ORDER_ITEM_ID, hoos.PROJECT_PROD_ID, hoos.STOCKUP_QTY, hoos.READY_FLAG, hoos.GOODS_NO, hoos.BARCODE, hoos.PBNO, hoos.SEND_BATCH_NO, hoos.INSTORE_BATCH_NO, hoos.CREATE_USER_ID, hoos.CREATE_USER_NAME, hoos.CREATE_DATE, hoos.MODIFY_USER_ID, hoos.MODIFY_USER_NAME, hoos.MODIFY_DATE, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_STOCKUP hoos, HC_ORD_ORDER hoo WHERE hoos.ORDER_ID = hoo.ID AND hoo.STATE != '6' AND hoo.BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT hoos.ID FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_STOCKUP hoos, HC_ORD_ORDER hoo WHERE hoos.ORDER_ID = hoo.ID AND hoo.STATE != '6' AND hoo.BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT hoor.ID, hoor.DATA_PRODUCT_ID, hoor.PROJECT_ID, hoor.TYPE, hoor.CODE, hoor.PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, hoor.ORDER_ID, hoor.ORDER_ITEM_ID, hoor.INVOICE_ID, hoor.GOODS_NO, hoor.BARCODE, hoor.PBNO, hoor.SEND_BATCH_NO, hoor.INSTORE_BATCH_NO, hoor.STORE_ROOM_ID, hoor.STORE_ROOM_NAME, hoor.ARRIVAL_ADDRESS, hoor.ARRIVE_DATE, hoor.PRICE, hoor.FACT_AMOUNT, hoor.FACT_SUM, hoor.RETURN_AMOUNT, hoor.RETURN_SUM, hoor.CREATE_USER_ID, hoor.CREATE_USER_NAME, hoor.CREATE_DATE, hoor.MODIFY_USER_ID, hoor.MODIFY_USER_NAME, hoor.MODIFY_DATE, hoor.DESCRIPTIONS, hoor.STOCKUP_ID, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_RECEIVE hoor, HC_ORD_ORDER hoo WHERE hoor.ORDER_ID = hoo.ID AND hoo.STATE != '6' AND hoo.BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT hoor.ID FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_RECEIVE hoor, HC_ORD_ORDER hoo WHERE hoor.ORDER_ID = hoo.ID AND hoo.STATE != '6' AND hoo.BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, CODE, RECEIVE_ID, ORD_ID, ORD_ITEM_ID, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, BRAND, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, PRICE, SUM, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, BASE_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, AMOUNT, STATE, SEND_OPERATOR_ID, SEND_OPERATOR_NAME, SEND_OPERATOR_DATE, INSTORE_OPERATOR_ID, INSTORE_OPERATOR_NAME, INSTORE_OPERATOR_DATE, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_BUYER_RETURN WHERE STATE != '3' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, RECEIVE_ID, RETRUN_ID, RESULT_TYPE, TYPE, CODE, INVOICE_ID, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, COMMON_NAME, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, BASE_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, ARRIVAL_ADDRESS, ARRIVE_DATE, PRICE, FACT_AMOUNT, FACT_SUM, STATE, SEND_OPERATOR_ID, SEND_OPERATOR_NAME, SEND_OPERATOR_DATE, INSTORE_OPERATOR_ID, INSTORE_OPERATOR_NAME, INSTORE_OPERATOR_DATE, BACK_AMOUNT, BACK_SUM, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_RESULT WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, INVOICE_CODE, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, TOTAL_SUM, OVER_SUM, SENDED_DATE, STATE, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_INVOICE_FROM WHERE STATE != '4' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, INVOICE_FROM_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, BATCH_NO, VALID_DATE, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, STORE_ROOM_ADDRESS, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, RETAIL_PRICE, TRADE_PRICE, AMOUNT, SUM, OVER_AMOUNT, OVER_SUM, STATE, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_INVOICE_FROM_ITEM WHERE STATE != '3' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, CODE, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, STATE, REMARK, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, SEND_USER_ID, SEND_USER_NAME, SEND_DATE, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_ORD_STOCK WHERE STATE!= '4' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT hosi.ID, hosi.DATA_PRODUCT_ID, hosi.PROJECT_ID, hosi.STOCK_ID, hosi.PROJECT_PROD_ID, hosi.MANUFACTURE_ID, hosi.MANUFACTURE_NAME, hosi.MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, hosi.COMMON_NAME, hosi.PRODUCT_NAME, hosi.PRODUCT_CODE, hosi.BRAND, hosi.SPEC_ID, hosi.MODEL_ID, hosi.SPEC, hosi.MODEL, hosi.GOODS_NO, hosi.BARCODE, hosi.BATCH_NO, hosi.VALID_DATE, hosi.NUM, hosi.STATE, hosi.REMARK, hosi.CREATE_USER_ID, hosi.CREATE_USER_NAME, hosi.CREATE_DATE, hosi.MODIFY_USER_ID, hosi.MODIFY_USER_NAME, hosi.MODIFY_DATE, hosi.PBNO, hosi.SEND_BATCH_NO, hosi.INSTORE_BATCH_NO, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_ORD_STOCK_ITEM hosi, HC_ORD_ORD_STOCK hoos WHERE hosi.STATE!= '4' AND hosi.STOCK_ID = hoos.ID AND hoos.BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, SENDER_ID, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, SENDER_NAME, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, BARCODE, PRICE, BATCH_NO, VALID_DATE, NUM, REMARK, STATE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, STOCK_ITEM_ID, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORD_SECOND_AYRLNV WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, SECOND_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, ARRIVAL_ADDRESS, ARRIVE_DATE, PRICE, FACT_AMOUNT, FACT_SUM, STATUS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, DESCRIPTIONS, BUYER_ID, SENDER_ID, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_ORG_SECOND_AYRLNV_USE WHERE STATUS != '0' AND BUYER_ID = :Id

SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, BULLETIN_ID, RECEIVER_ID, IS_READ, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_BULLETIN_RECEIVER WHERE RECEIVER_ID = :Id

SELECT HBI.ID, HBI.PROJECT_ID, HBI.TITLE, HBI.CONTENT, HBI.STATE, HBI.TYPE, HBI.ISSUER_ORG_ID, HBI.ISSUER_ID, HBI.ISSUER_NAME, HBI.ISSUE_DATE, HBI.CREATE_USER_ID, HBI.CREATE_USER_NAME, HBI.CREATE_DATE, HBI.MODIFY_USER_ID, HBI.MODIFY_USER_NAME, HBI.MODIFY_DATE FROM HC_BULLETIN_INFO HBI,HC_BULLETIN_RECEIVER HBR WHERE HBI.ID = HBR.BULLETIN_ID AND STATE != '3' AND HBR.RECEIVER_ID = :Id

SELECT hppc.ID, hppc.CLASS_NAME, hppc.PROJECT_ID, hppc.CREATE_USER_ID, hppc.CREATE_USER_NAME, hppc.CREATE_DATE, hppc.MODIFY_USER_ID, hppc.MODIFY_USER_NAME, hppc.MODIFY_DATE FROM HC_PROJECT_PRODUCT_CLASS hppc , HC_PROJECT_ORG hpo WHERE hppc.PROJECT_ID = hpo.PROJECT_ID AND hpo.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND hpo.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT hppc.ID FROM HC_PROJECT_PRODUCT_CLASS hppc , HC_PROJECT_ORG hpo WHERE hppc.PROJECT_ID = hpo.PROJECT_ID AND hpo.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND hpo.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT hppc.ID, hppc.CLASS_ID, hppc.PROJECT_ID, hppc.PRODUCT_ID, hppc.CREATE_USER_ID, hppc.CREATE_USER_NAME, hppc.CREATE_DATE, hppc.MODIFY_USER_ID, hppc.MODIFY_USER_NAME, hppc.MODIFY_DATE FROM HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONTENT hppc , HC_PROJECT_ORG hpo WHERE hppc.PROJECT_ID = hpo.PROJECT_ID AND hpo.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND hpo.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id AND exists (select 1 from hc_ord_buyer_sender b where b.enable_flag = '1' AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND b.project_prod_id = hppc.PRODUCT_ID)
sql.keysql: SELECT HPPC.ID FROM HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONTENT hppc , HC_PROJECT_ORG hpo WHERE hppc.PROJECT_ID = hpo.PROJECT_ID AND hpo.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND hpo.DATA_ORG_ID = :Id AND exists (select 1 from hc_ord_buyer_sender b where b.enable_flag = '1' AND b.buyer_id = :Id AND b.project_prod_id = hppc.PRODUCT_ID)

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, CREATE_USER_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, CLASS_ID, INVOICE_FLAG, ORDER_FLAG, STOCK_FLAG, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, PROJECT_ID FROM HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONFIG WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_PROJECT_PROD_CLASS_CONFIG WHERE BUYER_ID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, ORGID, HIT_COMM_ID, PRODUCT_MNEMONIC, SELF_PACKAGE, ALIAS, ALIAS_PINYIN, MODIFY_USERID, MODIFY_DATE, '1' as SYNC_STATE FROM HC_SELF_DEFINE_INFO WHERE ORGID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_SELF_DEFINE_INFO WHERE ORGID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, MAP_ORGTYPE, MAP_ORGID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, HH_MODE_ID, HH_SPEC_ID, PRODUCT_ID, HIS_PRODUCT_ID, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, COMMERCE_NAME, BRAND, MODE_ID, MODE_NAME, SPEC_ID, SPEC, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATE, STAND_RATE, FACTORY_CODE, FACTORY_Name, SALER_CODE, SALER_NAME, SENDER_CODE, SENDER_NAME, STOCK_ID, STOCK_NAME, MODIFY_USERID, MODIFY_DATE, PROCESS_FLAG, '1' as SYNC_STATE, REMARK, ISMAP FROM HC_PRODUCT_MAP WHERE MAP_ORGID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_PRODUCT_MAP WHERE MAP_ORGID = :Id

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, MAP_ORGTYPE, MAP_ORGID, ORG_ID, HIS_ORG_ID, FULL_NAME, EASY_NAME, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, TELPHONE, LINKMAN, ISFACTORY, ISSENDER, ISSALER, MODIFY_USERID, MODIFY_DATE, PROCESS_FLAG, '1' as SYNC_STATE, REMARK, ISMAP FROM HC_CORP_MAP WHERE MAP_ORGID = :Id
sql.keysql: SELECT ID FROM HC_CORP_MAP WHERE MAP_ORGID = :Id
